nodes.name: AI Agent

parameters.text:
=You are expert backend principal engineer specialize in python. You will compare job description and candidate profile.

Then you will response with decision [REJECTED/KIV/SHORTLISTED].
, provide a reason and give a score rating
{ decision, reason , score}

After you identify a decision, used the tool in sequence.
1. Use the relevant tool to move the candidate resume file accordingly to the right folder GoogleDrive:MoveFileToReject or GoogleDrive:MoveFileToShortlisted or GoogleDrive:MoveFileToKIV
2. Use the Gsheet:UpdateTracker tool to update the tracker status.
3. Use the Gmail:NotificationTool to infor the candidate name, role, decision and reason

==[JOB-DESC]===
{{ $json.content }}
==[/JOB-DESC]===

==[CANDIDATE-DESC]===
{{ $('Extract from File').item.json.text }}
 
==[/CANDIDATE-DESC]===

options.systemMessage:
You are expert backend principal engineer specialize in python. You will compare job description and candidate profile.

Then you will response with decision [REJECTED/KIV/SHORTLISTED].
and provide a reason.
{ decision, reason}

After you identify a decision, used the tool 
1. Use the relevant tool to move the candidate resume file accordingly to the right folder GoogleDrive:MoveFileToReject or GoogleDrive:MoveFileToShortlisted or GoogleDrive:MoveFileToKIV
2. Use the Gsheet-UpdateTracker tool to update the tracker status.

nodes.name: Sticky Note5

parameters.content:
# AI-Agent : Automated CV Resume Screening Evaluate Rating System

## What is this for?
### Let AI agent intelligently analyze and rate your Candidate's cv resumes based on your job description. This will help ensure a fast and accurate screening process.

### The Screening AI automatically organizes resumes into appropriate folders, updates statuses and scores in your tracking system, and sends timely notifications—saving you valuable time and effort. 


### Let AI Agent and automation handle the heavy lifting while you focus on making the best hiring decisions!


```
```

## Prerequisite

### Please follow official n8n integration document on how setup your gdrive,gmail,gdoc,gsheet credentials. 

 
```
```

## How it works?

### Each time you place a new pdf resume in the 'Unfiltered' folder , you will automatically get screening results in the tracker for the candidate. 

The AI agent will help notify email and do CV sorting into appropriate folder.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# AI Agent - Cv Resume - Automated Screening , Sorting , Rating and Tracker System

## Overview
Automated workflow: AI Agent - Cv Resume - Automated Screening , Sorting , Rating and Tracker System. This workflow integrates 11 different services: stickyNote, googleDriveTrigger, googleDriveTool, gmailTool, agent. It contains 28 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 28
- **Node Types**: 11
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **GDocs - Get Job Desc**: googleDocs
- **Google Drive - Resume CV File Created**: googleDriveTrigger
- **Download Resume File From Gdrive**: googleDrive
- **AI Agent**: agent
- **Extract from File**: extractFromFile
- **Gmail:Notification**: gmailTool
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note1**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note2**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note3**: stickyNote
- ... and 18 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.
